= Editable jquery tree with PHP Codes =
This software is a tree structure runs at web browsers 
and completes its function, like add item,
change name, drag & drop and delete item, 
by using ajax requests, PHP and MySQL so server has to have
PHP and MySQL softwares to make this software run.
                                                                                         
This software also uses <a href='http://jquery.com'>jquery javascript framework</a>,
<a href='http://news.kg/wp-content/uploads/tree/'>simple tree plugin.</a> 

== INSTALL ==
Set your database parameters in 'includes/config.php',
also you can change TREE_TABLE_PREFIX macro whose default value is 'tree'.<br/>
Then create table according to TREE_TABLE_PREFIX macro 
{{{
 CREATE TABLE  `tree_elements` (
 `Id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
 `name` varchar(45) NOT NULL,
 `position` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0',
 `ownerEl` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0' COMMENT 'parent',
 `slave` binary(1) NOT NULL default '0',
 PRIMARY KEY  (`Id`)
 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;
}}}  

== Features ==  
=== Add item ===   
<img src="http://sites.google.com/site/editablejquerytree/Home/addElement.jpg?attredirects=0"  style="float:left;"/>
<br/>
Right click a item to open the menu, then click
'Add File' or 'Add Folder' to add a child item under the right clicked item     <br />
<div  style="clear:both"><img src="http://sites.google.com/site/editablejquerytree/Home/addElementText.jpg?attredirects=0" style="float:left;"/> 
<img src="http://sites.google.com/site/editablejquerytree/Home/elementAdded.jpg?attredirects=0"  style="float:left;"/>
<br/>
Enter the new item's name into the text field, 
then press <b>Enter</b> to send an ajax request to server and complete the operation or 
press <b>Esc</b> to cancel the operation.                             


=== Delete item ===
<img src="http://sites.google.com/site/editablejquerytree/Home/deleteElement.jpg?attredirects=0"  style="float:left;"/>
<img src="http://sites.google.com/site/editablejquerytree/Home/deleteElementLast.jpg?attredirects=0"  style="float:left;"/>
<br/>
Right click a item to open the menu, then click
'Delete', it will ask whether you are sure to delete the item,
if yes is clicked, an ajax request will be send to server to complete the operation
after process is completed succesfully, an item will be removed from tree.
Please not to forget that if an item is deleted, all child items beloging to it
will be deleted recursively.


=== Change the position of an item (Drag & Drop) ===
<img src="http://sites.google.com/site/editablejquerytree/Home/dragElement.jpg?attredirects=0"  style="float:left;"/> 
<img src="http://sites.google.com/site/editablejquerytree/Home/dropElement.jpg?attredirects=0"  style="float:left;"/>
<br/>
Use drag & drop method to change the position and order of an item.


=== Change the name of an item ===
<img src="http://sites.google.com/site/editablejquerytree/Home/editElement.jpg?attredirects=0"  style="float:left;"/>
<br/>
Right click a item to open the menu, then click
'Edit'.
<br/>
<img src="http://sites.google.com/site/editablejquerytree/Home/addElementText.jpg?attredirects=0"  style="float:left;"/> 
<img src="http://sites.google.com/site/editablejquerytree/Home/elementAdded.jpg?attredirects=0"  style="float:left;"/>
<br/>
Enter the item's new name into the text field, 
then press <b>Enter</b> to send an ajax request and complete the operation or
press <b>Esc</b> to cancel the operation.
